When I become we, illness becomes wellness
Welcome to THE REHAB, A virtual platform which serves to through commitment and help create daily structure meditation.
THE REHAB grants you access manage day to day life and goal is to help you cope and Address deeper issues.
We work independently and A support system, that is easily with mental health conditions.
A support system ,that is easily accessible just a few clicks away.
Select one of the below questionnaires to assess whether you may be suffering from any of the mental disorders
You seem to have symptoms that could resemble depression. Please note the following information

This questionnaire is not a diagnosis and can not tell you if you have this disorder. The questionnaire only shows symptoms that may appear with this disorder. This questionnaire has no significance, whether you suffer from this disorder or not. Only a specialist or psychologist can make a reliable diagnosis.
You show little or no symptoms of depression. Please note the following information

This questionnaire is not a diagnosis and can not tell you if you have this disorder. The questionnaire only shows symptoms that may appear with this disorder. This questionnaire has no significance, whether you suffer from this disorder or not. Only a specialist or psychologist can make a reliable diagnosis.
Major depressive disorder is a common and serious medical illness that negatively affects how you feel, the way you think and how you act. fortunately, it is also treatable.
You seem to have symptoms that could resemble addiction. Please note the following information
You seem to have symptoms that could resemble anxiety. Please note the following information
You seem to have symptoms that could resemble eating disorder. Please note the following information
Eating disorders are a range of conditions characterized by abnormal or irregular eating habits and severe distress about body weight, size or shape.
Addiction is the psychological and physical inability to stop a particular substance or activity, despite dire consequences such as psychological and physical harm
An action characterized by feelings of tension , worried thoughts and physical changes like increased blood pressure.
Thank you so much for subscribing to our application. We truly appreciate your support and interest. If you have any questions about THE REHAB please select our feedback page.
Our primary goal is to provide you with the best mental health care possible which is easy and efficient.

If you like to continue with the service that we provide , please click on the sign up below. Or if you do not wish to at this present tome please click on the exit tab. We look forward tp continuing A relationship with you in the future.
Thank you again for subscribing to THE REHAB.
Kind Regards:
THE REHAB
THE REHAB and the REHAB CENTERS are teams of professional and qualified members who play an important role in assisting you or a loved one (clients) in getting through your treatment process.
We have qualified therapists and psychologists that will be assigned to help you with your recovery.
Our programme is for clients with mental health issues who suffer from the following disorders Anxiety, Depression ,Addiction and Eating Disorders.
Outpatient treatment is Mental Health sufferers and substance abuse rehabilitation that doesn\'t disrupt your daily life

The Outpatient program is great for you when you\'ve got day to day responsibilities, you can login to THE REHAB at anytime you need. The Outpatient program is also great for when you have come out of a clinic that can be used as a step down programme to help you with your recovery.
As an outpatient you would still need to have structure in your day to day life and we will help you with a routine that works for you and will fit in with a regular and consistent time frame.
We will be there to hel and guide you during the hard and difficult times, whilst you continue with your day to day activities.
Our mental health and substance abuse sufferers can count on our teams for support and understanding.
Outside support from peers, family and AA/NA group meetings within a community for support, strength and encouragement on your journey.

You as an outpatient would need to be committed to the programme without supervision, as you are not supervised inside a treatment center. Outpatient treatment works with a healthy support system with a 2 step programme for your recovery.

THE REHAB is here for you , if your disorder is manageable outside of a clinic with outpatient treatment. However if you cannot manage your symptoms then you will have to start as an impatient before you join outpatient programme.
We at THE REHAB value you as an individual , putting your life ahead is what matters to us. Your health and well-being to be restored to live your life.
THE REHAB shares inspirational chats and quotes with ou , for inspiring motivation of healing within oneself.
We give you live video chats, with qualified professional Therapist and psychologist for your sessions.
We are dedicated to providing the best possible care with our outpatient treatment programme
"Our aim is to help mental health suffer all over the world, and build awareness all around. People in today's society would understand more about disorders and would seek help from young ages."
This programme is to help make the change in your life, with your strength and our guidance we will fight for a better future.
We are here to give you a great and easy significance structure with helping to remove stigma and build awareness around the world

"People would be helped in today's society from a young age and they would be more understanding of mental health disorders. This programme opens yout doors to a better future , together wwe will make that change."

3 WEEKS TO PRIMARY RECOVERY
The package offers you an intense 3 weeks of therapeutic sessions, lectures and support to manage yourself abilities doing step work 1, 2 and 3 of the 2 step program.
This package offers you an intense 4 weeks of therapeutic sessions, lectures and support to manage yourself abilities. Have a sponsor working with you and building a solid recovery foundation.
This package offers you a full 12 step program of therapy, lectures, connecting and activity to boost and stimulate your body and mind.
